channel.title: KrypticPvP - A New Kind Of Experience!
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2ljic76.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=14pt]Links![/size][/center]
[center]Webclient: http://k-pvp.webs.com/webclient
Downloadable Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/86ds8kxntg9eski/KrypticPvP_V2.jar
Website: http://k-pvp.webs.com[/center]
[color=blue][center][b][size=24pt]Media![/size][/b][/center]
[center]Login Screen! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xbn0bo.png[/img]
Pk Points! [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/13yi1yg.png[/img]
Level Points! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/231phu.png[/img]
Customs 1 [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/23shph5.png[/img]
Customs 2 [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2hygcc9.png[/img]
ClanChat! [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/etrz7k.png[/img]
Crowns! [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/2096dld.png[/img]
ChatBox Help! [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2cqjivm.png[/img]
Boss Tele 3 [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/21algcm.png[/img]
Boss Tele 2 [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/zkialw.png[/img]
Boss Tele 1 [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/21llh6g.png[/img] [/center]
[b][center][size=24pt][b]INFORMATION![/b][/size][/size] KrypticPvP is a new server that has alot to offer! We have a great economy, Nice players and staff, Once our playerbase grows we will offer staff positions !
[size=18pt]Features![/size]
[size=24pt]Nex Dungeoneering Exp Bar Summoning With Attacking Familiars Alot of great customs! Elite Slayer Torva and other nex sets Glacors! - Still being coded Avatar of Destruction! - Still being coded All godwars bosses - No Zammy - Zammy being coded Droprates at a decent percentage Xp rates at a decent percentage Double and Quadruple XP rings dropped by all bosses - Bork drops most often Chaotics Great Interfaces Find out the rest when you join the server![/size][/center][/b]
[center][size=14pt]Links![/size][/center]
[center]Webclient: http://k-pvp.webs.com/webclient
Downloadable Client: http://www.mediafire.com/download/86ds8kxntg9eski/KrypticPvP_V2.jar
Website: http://k-pvp.webs.com[/center]

item.title: KrypticPvP - A New Kind Of Experience!
item.dc:creator: @lol_space1 lol space
item.description:
@lol_space1 wrote:

enahsh2o:

Probably shouldn’t of mentioned the ‘Ignore pernix’ part in one of the pictures, it made me go out of my way to look for the Pernix lol. Anyways doesn’t look too bad, I am just not a custom items person. So won’t be playing.

Haha, Yeah the pernix part XD and awwe damn that sucks

Read full topic
item.source: KrypticPvP - A New Kind Of Experience!

[b][center][size=24pt]INFORMATION![/size][/size]
KrypticPvP is a new server that has alot to offer! We have a great economy, Nice players and staff, Once our playerbase grows we will offer staff positions !

[size=18pt]Features![/size]

[size=24pt]Nex
Dungeoneering
Exp Bar
Summoning With Attacking Familiars
Alot of great customs!
Elite Slayer
Torva and other nex sets
Glacors! - Still being coded
Avatar of Destruction! - Still being coded
All godwars bosses - No Zammy - Zammy being coded
Droprates at a decent percentage
Xp rates at a decent percentage
Double and Quadruple XP rings dropped by all bosses - Bork drops most often
Chaotics
Great Interfaces
Find out the rest when you join the server![/size][/center][/b]
